mapper.select:
select
from jljs_member_info where del_flag = '0'
and member_name like concat('%',#{criteria.memberName},'%')
and member_gender = #{criteria.memberGender}
and member_phone_num like concat('%',#{criteria.memberPhoneNum},'%')
and birth_day like concat('%',#{criteria.birthDay},'%')
AND member_age BETWEEN #{criteria.memberAge[0]} AND #{criteria.memberAge[1]}
order by id desc

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(member_name) AS memberName, birth_day AS birthDay, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()), '/', birth_day), '%Y/%m/%d'), '%m%d') AS sort FROM jljs_member_info t1 WHERE t1.del_flag = '0' AND birth_day IS NOT NULL GROUP BY birth_day ORDER BY CAST(sort AS UNSIGNED)
